articles.title: Trump calls on CEO of tech firm Intel to resign over China investments - Al Jazeera
articles.description: The Republican president criticised CEO Lip-Bu Tan for being ‘conflicted’ due to his ties to Chinese technology firms.
articles.content:
United States President Donald Trump has fired off a social media message calling on the head of the US technology firm Intel to resign from his post as chief executive officer.
